Description:
Your slice of leafy Highton.
This gorgeous home provides outstanding value and is perfectly positioned on an excellent allotment of 586sqm (approx.) and provides an ideal opportunity for first home buyers or investors looking to expand their portfolio. Presented neatly inside and showcasing polished hardwood floors that flow throughout. Good sized family room offers plenty of natural light and space, whilst meals area adjoins functional kitchen with plenty of bench space. Three great sized bedrooms with built in robes, accompanied by the neat and tidy bathroom and separate laundry. The private north facing backyard, is what everyone is looking for. Surrounded by established maple trees and gardens, this impeccable grassed yard is ideal for entertaining friends and family.
Features include storage shed, window shutters, ducting heating and split system in the living area. Situated in a very sought after locale, less than 100m away from Bellaire Primary School, plus just minutes to the Highton Village, local sporting grounds, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and all public conveniences.
Insights: 12 Kennedy Grove, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious family home in quiet court.
Placed in a premium pocket of ever popular Highton, this home boasts size and convenience.
Just 5 minutes to Highton Village and Belmont's High Street shops, 15 minutes to Geelong CBD or 20 minutes to Torquay, it is perfectly positioned. With Christian College at an arms reach, minutes to Bellaire Primary, Deakin University, Waurn Ponds shopping mecca and Epworth Hospital.
Tucked away quietly in an established court, sitting on a large 924m2 approx. allotment with landscaped gardens and established trees. Newly carpeted and painted throughout this home has great potential for a growing family looking to be in a private premium location. Upon entry be greeted by the study/home office and the central living area with natural light which flows through to the kitchen, dining area and second living zone out onto the terrace overlooking the garden. Towards the rear is the master bedroom and 2 bedrooms with large built in robes, central bathroom and laundry. Additionally, offering large backyard space perfect for kids, pet owners or garden enthusiasts, large double car garage and garden shed.
Key Features:
Approx. 924m2 allotment
Just painted and carpeted throughout
Low maintenance brick
Established gardens and fruit trees
Quiet, private & peaceful court
Tightly held Highton location
Ducted heating
Minutes to Highton Village shops or Belmont High Street shops, 15 minutes to Geelong CBD & 20 minutes to Torquay.
10 minutes to Waurn Ponds train station
Close to Christian College, Bellaire Primary, Deakin University and Epworth Hospital
Nearby amenities: Woolworths/ALDI/Coles, Waurn Ponds Shopping Complex, Pharmacy, local restaurants, cafes and retail shops.
Insights: 15 Villawood Court, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Tightly held blue chip Highton.
Every now and again along comes a home that transcends conventional living with its unique style, immaculate presentation and family friendly floor plan. This is one such home. Light filled spaces reveal three spacious bedrooms that all flow effortlessly through to the central living area, fully equipped kitchen and formal dining. Ensuite to master and central bathrooms will also make your guests fell right at home. Tranquillity and privacy is what defines this charming home in one of Highton's most desired tree-lined streets. The north facing outdoor patio is perfect for all seasons, accompanied by well-established gardens and ample grassed space for kids and pets to play. Features include ducting heating through the floor, reverse cycle cooling system through the ceiling and double car garage with internal access. Perfect home or astute investment in growth locale, the sun- soaked allotment of 632sqm approx. boasts seamless access to all of Highton's finest amenities including the Highton Village, Porter Avenue shops, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and the Ring Road.

Description:
Picture-Perfect Living Awaits In Highton!
Nestled in a leafy pocket of Old Highton, this beautifully-updated home promises a blissful lifestyle! Featuring stylish interiors, a superb outdoor entertaining area, and north-facing backyard, every inch of this property will delight!
Bellaire P.S is within easy walking distance, along with public transport and the Porter Avenue shops. Families will also appreciate easy access to Belmont High School, Barwon Valley School, and the Christian College Campuses. The sporting grounds of McDonald Reserve will keep everyone active, while both Highton Village and the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre provide you with an abundance of shopping and dining options. Easy access to Deakin University (Waurn Ponds) and Epworth Hospital adds the final touch to this superb locale.
Quality updates are showcased both inside and out, with the fresh interiors exuding contemporary style. Graced with a gas log fireplace, the light-filled lounge inspires relaxation while flowing through to the kitchen/dining zone. The kitchen perfectly unites style and functionality with stone waterfall benchtops, built-in pantry, and stainless steel Bosch dishwasher. The 900mm Belling oven/gas cooktop adds a splash of personality in yellow, while pendant lighting makes a chic statement above the island bench.
Three bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the stunning bathroom, which boasts a large open shower and freestanding tub. The north-facing study is complete with a built-in desk and storage, while the laundry and separate toilet complete the layout. A split-system air conditioner and electric wall heaters provide additional comfort.
Entertainers will be in their element when they lay eyes on the north-facing backyard. Complete with downlights and ceiling fans, the covered alfresco deck creates the perfect setting for year-round enjoyment. A flowering gum drapes over the sun-drenched deck, while the lush backyard is home to a versatile workshop & cute cubby house. A high fence and electric gate create privacy in the front yard, which is home to another alfresco deck. Ample parking includes a remote lock-up tandem garage with rear roller door. With nothing left to do except move in and enjoy, this home will be at the top of your list! Inspect ASAP!
Insights: 16 Moreton Bay Drive, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
711sqm corner block - RGZ.
Zoned Residential Growth and situated on approx. 711sqm, just metres from the Highton Village, the proximity alone lends itself to development as residential and small business use. The corner block has access from Barrabool Road and is less than a minutes walk to the Highton Village that offers all your daily amenities. The property consists of three bedrooms, master with walk in robe and updated ensuite, remanding bedrooms equipped with built in robes and are serviced by the central bathroom. Large living space leads into the spacious kitchen and dining area, which seamlessly flows out onto the front patio. With ample off-street parking and north facing undercover entertaining area. Neatly presented property in an unbeatable locale, fantastic potential, is sure to bring some developers out of the woodwork.

Description:
Family-Friendly Living That Ticks Every Box!
When it comes to family-friendly living, it doesn't get much better than this! Featuring updated interiors, vehicle access to the spacious backyard, and a convenience-plus location, this Grovedale gem will be at the top of your list!
With both Grovedale West P.S and Grovedale College a short stroll from your front door, you'll never have to worry about beating the school traffic again. The Heyers Road shops are footsteps away, which include a Champions IGA and Medical Centre. The Burdoo Recreation Reserve is just down the road, while public transport and the Grovedale Community Hub are also within walking distance. Close access to the Ring Road and Waurn Ponds Train Station is ideal for commuters, while the Surf Coast Highway grants easy access to the region's iconic surf beaches. Enjoy living moments from Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin Uni (Waurn Ponds), and Epworth Hospital.
Freshly painted walls and new quality carpet grace the interiors, along with floorboards and sash windows that exude original character. Glass sliding doors welcome you into the generous lounge, which features a charming front window and flows through to the kitchen/dining zone. The freshly painted kitchen is well equipped with an oven, gas cooktop, and rangehood. The sunroom offers immense versatility as a kids play space, teen retreat, or even an artist's studio. Three bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the bathroom. The laundry, storage room, and two separate toilets complete the layout. A gas wall heater and ceiling fans provide comfort, while new window furnishings are another huge plus.
Soaking up the western sunlight, the two alfresco decks set the scene for casual outdoor living. You'll love relaxing under the sun's rays as you watch the kids play in the spacious backyard. The single lock-up garage features internal access via the sunroom, while the rear roller door allows for additional vehicle storage - perfect storing a caravan, trailer, or boat!
Ticking every box for easy family living, you'll need to act swiftly to secure this Grovedale gem! Inspect ASAP!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Titled land in Highton!
Offering this large titled block, comprising the most exceptional land available within a stones throw of Geelong CBD. Only a hop skip and jump away to the picturesque Barwon River and the beauty of Buckley Falls. This land allotment offers the very best in prestigious and luxury lifestyle opportunities.
-Some of Geelong's best schools only minutes away
-Walking distance to the new Woolworths complex
-Walking distance to everyday conveniences such a Anytime Fitness Gym & Chemist
-Take in all that mother nature has to off utilising the walking tracks along the Barwon River
-Commuters will be pleased to know the Geelong Ring Road is easily accessible
-Enjoy everything the region has to offer including wineries and the coast close by

Description:
Exclusive Family Living In The Highton Hills!
Less than two years old, this owner-builder residence takes luxury family living to a whole new level! The on-trend interiors showcase uncompromised style and quality, while the spacious layout and sun-drenched pool zone will astound!
The Barrabool Hills Shopping Plaza is a short stroll from your front door, while the scenic Barwon River and Queens Park Golf Course are moments away. Easy access to schools, private colleges, and the Ring Road puts the practical elements in place.
High, square-set ceilings enhance the sleek interiors, with Spotted Gum floorboards and polished concrete floors throughout. Northern light sweeps through the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone, which unites with the sheltered alfresco - creating a stunning setting for both everyday living and entertaining. Boasting a gas log fireplace and automated café blinds, the alfresco is perfectly designed for year-round enjoyment. The solar and gas-heated swimming pool (with in-floor cleaner) inspires outdoor family fun, while the Theatre Room provides yet another zone that will impress both children and adults alike. The kitchen is a dream come true with stone benchtops, a butlers pantry, F&P double-drawer dishwasher, and Bosch appliances (double wall oven, 900mm gas cooktop, convector/microwave oven, built-in coffee machine).
The Master Retreat exudes luxury with the lounge opening onto a private balcony with views towards the Fyansford hills. The walk-in robe provides storage, while the lavish en suite showcases an open shower and solid stone freestanding tub. The office adjoins the Master Retreat while also offering separate access via a balcony perfect for home business owners. Three additional bedrooms with walk-in robes, two bathrooms, large laundry with storage, and a powder room with stone basin complete the layout. Landscaped gardens surround the property, with the lush lawn providing a play space for young children.
Other features inc. hydronic heating (inc. heated towel rails), two indoor gas log fireplaces, five split-system air conditioners, ducted vacuum, double-glazing, Bluetooth audio system, C-BUS Home Automation System, stone benchtops throughout, and 3-phase electricity. The remote lock-up garage provides parking for three vehicles, while a shipping container offers outdoor storage. Enquire today!
Insights: 38 Valencay Avenue, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 108 other 4 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Picture perfect family living
There is something special about a bespoke home in blue-chip Highton. Once renovated to perfection, integrating contemporary appeal whilst maintaining the timber features of the era, an unmatched sense of warmth is achieved. Beautifully light and bright, a great sized useable yard and fantastic undercover outdoor in the heart of established Highton, this home is something else.
Stunning renovation with beautiful hardwood timber flooring
New contemporary kitchen - Smeg cooktop, sink and pyrolytic oven
Ensuite - Italian imported tapwear, Alessi vanity, rainfall shower, wall jets
Spacious laundry with drying cupboard and under cabinet power points
Underhouse storage/possibility for teenage retreat or man cave
Programmable automatic pop-up sprinkler system
Walk to Highton Village and Barrabool Hills Shopping close by
Great access to public and private schools and Ring road for commuters
Located within the prestigious Belmont High School zone
Central heating, ceiling fans, split systems

Description:
Renovated and ready to move straight in
This stunning family home has just completed a full make over, having undergone a superior renovation and is now waiting for a new owner to take the keys and enjoy the lifestyle Highton has to offer. Boasting four bedrooms, two living zones, two bathrooms, a private backyard and is nestled in a quiet location in the heart of Highton. With direct access to parklands and a walking track to Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre along with Highton Park and St Augustine's Lake just a few minutes' walk from your front door. The Geelong Ring Road, Deakin University & Epworth Hospital are all just a short drive away and public transport is just around the corner. Close proximity to some of the best schools in the suburb, Christian College, Clairvaux Catholic PS, Bellaire & Highton Primary Schools, kindergartens and child care centres are all on offer. Landscaped, low maintenance gardens on a generous 704m2 parcel of land, this home ticks all the boxes for a growing family.
• Spacious light filled kitchen, dining and family zone
• Separate lounge room with gas log fire
• Functional kitchen with stone bench tops, Bosch stainless steel appliances : wall oven, gas cook top, range hood & dishwasher. Walk in pantry and recessed sinks
• Elegant master bedroom with walk in robe
• Designer ensuite with stone bench top, dual sinks, fully tiled shower with double shower heads, frameless shower screen & toilet
• Spacious bedroom 2, bedrooms 3 & 4 with built in robes
• Central bathroom with stone bench top, free standing bath, fully tiled shower with double shower heads and frameless shower screen
• Under cover outdoor entertaining area with private yard and established gardens
• Oversized double remote garage with rear roller door
ADDITIONAL FEATURES:
• NEW Ducted zoned heating and refrigerated cooling system which can be accessed remotely via the "Mitsubishi Wi-Fi Control" App
• NEW carpet throughout
• NEW timber look flooring
• NEW panel lift remote garage door
• Freshly painted throughout
• Water tank
If you have been waiting for the perfect home in Highton to hit the market, be assured, 70 Augustine Drive is the one for you! Homes like this don't come along often, so make sure you inspect this magnificent property this weekend.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Quality at Every Turn
Perfectly situated on a generous allotment of 680m2 and nestled in a tightly-held pocket of Leopold, this architecturally-designed residence promises sensational family living!
The quiet location is only a short stroll from public transport and easy access to the sporting facilities of Leopold Memorial Reserve. Leopold Primary School and Leopold Community Hub are wonderfully close by for families, along with the expansive Gateway Plaza which takes care of all of your shopping needs.
High ceilings and timber flooring that flow throughout the home enhance the immaculate interiors. The spacious main bedroom, positioned at the front of the home, creates a peaceful haven for parents. Luxury is featured in the walk-in robe, private ensuite, which is complete with a large shower, single vanity, spa bath and toilet, and direct access to your own private undercover deck area. The remain two bedrooms with built-in robes and share close access to the main bathroom.
The spacious open plan living zone creates the hub of the home. Bathed in natural sunlight and opening through multiple glass doors to the private backyard - creating a beautiful indoor-outdoor connection that is ideal for entertaining! The stunning Tupac kitchen creates the focus of the open plan living zone, showcasing waterfall stone benchtops, quality stainless-steel appliances, including SMEG freestanding 900mm gas cooktop, dual drawer dishwasher, SMEG microwave, Bosch stainless steel fridge and ample soft-touch cupboards & drawers.
Youll love relaxing under the shaded alfresco surrounded by leafy gardens. The generous backyard is an outdoor oasis for children and adults alike. An array of veggies in the gardens invites you to enjoy your own fresh produce straight from the source!
The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, as well as the undercover carport for extra vehicle storage.
Added features include 2x split-system heating & cooling to keep you comfortable in all seasons, cedarwood skirts, window sills and doors throughout, R3 insulation, café weather blinds, garden shed & stunning water feature.
This quality home represents an outstanding lifestyle choice in Leopold, one of Geelong's high growth suburbs. This home would appeal to those looking for space and privacy while still having the luxury of all amenities close by. Don't delay inspecting this magnificent family home!
Insights: 7 Moonaree Road, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Coastal Townhouse Living
Spread over two levels the home is designed for easy coastal living. Light filled, open plan living, with great rear yard and easy access for beach toys are just a few features of the property. A great location further adds to the appeal.
Downstairs an inviting entrance features a practical tiled floor, perfect for sandy feet returning from the beach, and stairs leading to the second level. Two good sized bedrooms, full bathroom, laundry and an enclosed sunroom opening to the rear yard, complete the downstairs area.
Upstairs offers open plan living with functional kitchen and study nook. The angled ceiling gives a sense of space and sliding doors open on to the rear deck offering ocean views. The master bedroom is complete with ensuite and walk in robe along with a small, private deck.
A double garage with access into the home has a roller door through to the back yard, great access for jet skis, a small boat, trailer or camper. The private and secure rear yard offers plenty of room for the kids and two garden sheds will keep the handy person happy, while the 4kw solar system ensures little or no power bills. Walk to shops, beach, public transport, sporting ovals and schools.
This property is a gem if you are looking for something easy to maintain and ready to move into. I look forward to showing you through.
Note: Photo id with current address must be provided at all open for inspections due to Covid 19 restrictions.

THE PERFECT FAMILY HOME!!
This spacious family property should be on the top of everyones wish list, impeccably presented throughout this most appealing four-bedroom residence with multiple living zones makes the perfect family home. Comprising 4 bedrooms with built in robes, master with walk in robe and en-suite, family bathroom centrally located, a dedicated study situated at the front of the home could be the perfect home office for those who work from home. Open plan well-appointed kitchen, dining and living area with stone bench tops, 900mm cooktop and oven flows easily to an extensive undercover outdoor decked entertaining area. A separate 2nd living room for the adults to congregate while the 3rd living / rumpus room is the perfect zone for the children. The home features, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, outdoor shower, ducted vacuum system, double lock up garage on a 621m2 (approx.) allotment with private low maintenance gardens. Situated in the popular Great Ocean Views Estate and located within minutes of the RACV Resort, club house and golf course, beaches, walking tracks, Bell Street precinct, schools and kindergartens. Description:
Point Addis Paradise - Modern resort living on acres
This secluded coastal paradise in the tightly held Point Addis area directly abuts the Ironbark Basin, a haven for wildlife and birds and part of the Otway National Park. The residence is modern in its design and comprises three bedrooms, two living areas, two bathrooms, and a stunning and completely private outlook over the pool. There is also a separate 1 / 2 bedroom self-contained apartment which would make for the perfect bed and breakfast, families with older kids or extended family, freestanding gym/studio (or extra bed), established low maintenance gardens, carport, pool, extensive joinery for indoor storage, wood fired pizza oven, two sheds for external storage, separate large decks perfect for entertaining either beside pizza oven on in front of the pool, outdoor shower, idyllic beach retreat, your Pt Addis paradise will never get built out. Original O'Dowd design expanded with major Mark Gleeson extensions to create a flexible family home.

Description:
Lifestyle Home With Sweeping Views
The Feel:
Situated in an elevated position in the popular Estuary Estate, this wonderful family home presents as new & offers true versatility, with 3-4 bedrooms & multiple living areas. A customised alfresco creates a seamless connection to outdoor living, with westerly aspects capitalising on spectacular sunsets & incredible sweeping views. Fully landscaped, with a productive garden, cubby & room to park the trailer, families will love being 200m from the Reserve & minutes from Gateway Shopping Centre, school, kinder & onward to Geelong CBD.
The Facts:
-Quality custom-built brick veneer residence by Dennis Family Homes
-200m to playground, sporting ovals & Reserve
-Inviting entry, neutral colour scheme, Tassie Oak accents & polished concrete floors
-Spacious open plan living, meals & kitchen with high ceilings & decorative cornices
-Stunning, well-planned kitchen with island bench & WIP
-Stainless steel appliances (900mm Westinghouse oven, gas hob, Asko DW)
-Statement piece pendant over meals area, with seamless connection to outdoor area
-Dedicated Study buds off kitchen/meals area, with panoramic west aspect
-Covered alfresco with exposed aggregate concrete base & light-filtering pergola
-Custom-built/space-saving outdoor dining & bar setting
-Spectacular sweeping views including the iconic lights of GMHBA Stadium
-Ducted heating throughout, SSAC units to main living & 2nd living
-Versatile 2nd living/media room/4th bedroom with north aspect endorses family-friendly design
-Spacious Master BR with his n hers WIR, en suite featuring shower, toilet & vanity
-Zoned wing to 2 more bedrooms with BIRs & dedicated kids lounge/rumpus/study
-Central bathroom with relaxing bath tub, vanity, shower & separate toilet
-Fenced yard w/ amazing cubby, climbing gym & outdoor hot shower
-Low maintenance garden includes raised vegie beds & various productive fruit trees
-Double glazed windows to most, solar hot water,
-Exposed aggregate driveway to RC DLUG with internal & rear yard access, side gate for trailer
The Owner Loves.
We spend so much time outside, and purpose-built the raised dining setting to take advantage of our elevated position, the sunsets are absolutely beautiful here. Inside, its a great family home, with communal spaces & areas for individual pursuits.

Description:
Located in the exclusive Sands Golf Estate*
Tastefully finished and stylishly designed throughout, this quality two storey family home is sure to impress. Located in the exclusive Sands Golf Estate with only a fairway shot away from a game of golf and a very short walk to Torquay's beautiful beaches, this home exudes the perfect coastal lifestyle. The versatile and generous layout consists of four bedrooms (or three bedrooms plus study), master with ensuite and an additional two family sized bathrooms.
Lovely light filled open plan living, dining and kitchen situated downstairs will be your go to family and entertaining area. This space also provides additional enjoyment with its seamless aspect out to the alfresco area. This property is perfect for the growing family, to accommodate those extra holiday guests or investment purposes.
Dont miss out on this amazing opportunity to see your dream home and book a private inspection today.
* At 'The Sands' Torquay there are great facilities available at your doorstep; currently there is Peppers Resort, Hanners Restaurant, Functions, Golf Club & the Health Club.
Property owners at 'The Sands' Torquay are currently entitled to two named memberships of 'The Sands' Health Club, facilities currently include the heated swimming pool and gym.
For further information please view: https://thesandscommunity.com.au/health-club/.
'The Sands' Torquay Golf Club is a private golf course with public access. For further information please view: https://www.thesandstorquay.com/guests/golf/guestsgolf.mhtml.
DISCLAIMER:
Please view above websites for further information. Subject to change at any time. The Sands photos as a guide only.

Description:
SEASIDE CHARMER
Combining versatility, an eye for timeless style and lashings of light, this classic coastal abode on 460m2 approx. enjoys a tranquil leafy outlook in the popular Great Ocean Views estate. Elevated to capture glimpses of the ocean and provide complete privacy, this three bedroom, one owner home is position perfect being walking distance to the RACV golf course and resort, beaches, parks and public transport.
Featuring a huge open plan kitchen/ meals and living area upstairs which adjoins an outdoor balcony that is ideal for entertaining family and friends all year round. Downstairs provides a study, three bedrooms all with ceiling fans, huge central main bathroom complete with spa bath, separate laundry and remote controlled single garage.
Additional features include 3500 litre water tank, split system heating/ cooling upstairs, wellness inspired Balinese garden and meticulous throughout.
Insights: 56 Great Ocean Road, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Address: 5 Point Addis Road Bells Beach VIC 3228
Description:
Point Addis Paradise - Modern resort living on acres
This secluded coastal paradise in the tightly held Point Addis area directly abuts the Ironbark Basin, a haven for wildlife and birds and part of the Otway National Park. The residence is modern in its design and comprises three bedrooms, two living areas, two bathrooms, and a stunning and completely private outlook over the pool. There is also a separate 1 / 2 bedroom self-contained apartment which would make for the perfect bed and breakfast, families with older kids or extended family, freestanding gym/studio (or extra bed), established low maintenance gardens, carport, pool, extensive joinery for indoor storage, wood fired pizza oven, two sheds for external storage, separate large decks perfect for entertaining either beside pizza oven on in front of the pool, outdoor shower, idyllic beach retreat, your Pt Addis paradise will never get built out. Original O'Dowd design expanded with major Mark Gleeson extensions to create a flexible family home.
Insights: 5 Point Addis Road, Bells Beach VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020.
